errors.iun: Please enter a valid IUN code

detail.document-not-available: The document will be downloadable in a few minutes. You can try again by reloading the page or clicking on the link of the requested document
detail.domicile_PEC: Do you have a PEC address? Add it and you will no longer receive registered paper mail.
detail.domicile_EMAIL: Add your email address: we will send you a message every time you receive a notification.
detail.domicile_APPIO: Do you have the IO app? Activate the "Digital notifications" service to view and pay for notifications directly in the app.

payment.message-error-fetch-payment: We were unable to retrieve the payment data for this notification.
payment.message-completed: The payment has been made successfully.
payment.message-in-progress: Payment is in progress: <0>reload the page</0> in a few hours to check its status. If it is still in progress, <1>contact support</1>.
payment.message-failed: Payment was not successful. Press "Pay" to try again.
payment.message-network-error: An error occurred while retrieving the payment information. Reload page.
payment.message-missing-parameter: Notification code and/or organisation tax code not present!
payment.error-domain-unknown: Sorry, the Creditor Organisation is having trouble responding. Error code for support:
payment.error-payment-unavailable: Sorry, there is a technical issue with this notice. Error code for support:
payment.error-payment-unknown: Sorry, the notice data is incorrect. Error code for support:
payment.error-generic: We're sorry, an unexpected error has occurred. Reload page or contact us for assistance.
payment.error-canceled: Sorry, the Creditor Organisation has revoked this notice. Contact the Organisation for more information.
payment.error-expired: Sorry, the notice has expired and it is no longer possible to pay for it. Contact the Organisation for more information.

acts_files.downloadable_acts: The attached documents are available online for 120 days from the completion of the notification.
acts_files.not_downloadable_acts: As 120 days have passed since the date of completion, if you want to obtain the documents, you must contact the sender.
acts_files.notification_cancelled: As this notification has been cancelled, the attached documents are not available.

analog-workflow-failure-cause.M01: because the recipient cannot be located
analog-workflow-failure-cause.M07: because the address does not exist
analog-workflow-failure-cause.F01: due to theft of the envelope
analog-workflow-failure-cause.F02: due to loss of the envelope
analog-workflow-failure-cause.F03: due to deterioration of the envelope
